Netherlands XEN VPS by Leasedlayer

Leasedlayer offers 35% discount on Netherlands XEN Linux and Windows VPS.

Coupon Code : NLVPS@35

Leasedlayer Netherlands Xen VPS Hosting takes performance and reliability to the next level! Our XEN Linux VPS nodes are located in TIER III+ Evoswitch Datacenter in Amsterdam, Netherlands. We offer 1st 30 day Unconditional MoneyBack Guarantee* on VPS hosting service.

Leasedlayer 1Gbps Netherlands XEN Windows VPSs are powered by XEN-HVM Virtualization Technology, providing a strong isolated environment to work with various platforms. We provide Windows Server 2012 R2 Operating Systems with All Windows VPS.
